name: Dead Dreams (Aiaz Marx)
description:
Dead Dreams -  is a nonlinear, story-driven 2D psychological horror game inspired by Silent Hill 2.

A school game dev club of four friends breaks up after the tragic death of one of their members. Seven years later a mysterious "Player",  a suspect in several cyber-murders, forces them to face their worst fears and reveal what was behind those events.

Estimated running time: 50 minutes.

Instructions:

Arrows = Move

SPACE, Z or ENTER = Examine / Advance text

F4 / ALT+ENTER = Fullscreen

ESC, X = Menu / Cancel

WARNINGS: Suicide themes/depictions, Body horror, Graphic Violence.

Dead Dreams (DEMO) - is free to play, but you are welcome to contribute any amount you'd like. Contributing $2 will give you the access to a little text file with some game secrets. Your name will appear in the credits section of the full version.
